abstract: State attorneys general are preparing for a surge of prosecutions of financial fraud, and there are hints the Obama administration’s budget will add to the effort.
snippet: State attorneys general are preparing for a surge of prosecutions of financial fraud, and there are hints the Obama administration’s budget will add to the effort.
lead_paragraph: Spurred by rising public anger, federal and state investigators are preparing for a surge of prosecutions of financial fraud.

headline.main: Financial Fraud Is Focus of Attack by Prosecutors
headline.print_headline: Financial Fraud Rises as Target For Prosecutors
